channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is so excited to meet her new baby brother or sister, but they are taking forever to arrive until suddenly Mummy Pig announces the baby is coming, now.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is given the very important task of suggesting names for the new baby. She thinks of all sorts of names, but they aren't quite right.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Fuzzleglove gets carried away trying to make an evil sidekick in 'Fuzzbot!', then in 'Top Secret Notebook!', Derek accidentally returns Annabelle's secret notebook to the Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The nurse visits, and she decides that today's visit should be all about how to hold a baby. The nurse shows Peppa a special way for a small person to safely hold a baby.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Wandy gets a cold and is taken ill, Holly is given a replacement wand. This new wand can do lots of things that Wandy can't, and soon becomes the favourite.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora babysits Baby Flowers to help Isa in 'Adventures In Plantsitting', then in 'Andrea the Alebrije', Dora helps Andrea the Alebrije find her magical leaf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby, Pandy and their curious crew set out on an animal safari. Can they work together to find a mysterious creature? Let the adventure begin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim and Kai try to photograph the elusive SpaceBug.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora stops the Guava Geyser from erupting in 'The Floor Is Guava', then in 'We Are The Grumples', Dora travels to Troll World to find the Grumpy Old Troll.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby unboxes a charm bracelet that has a tiny bottle charm with a treasure map inside! Following the clues on the map, we find more charms for the bracelet.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's family squeeze into the new car that Daddy Pig is trying out for fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny and Grandpa's while Granny hosts a historical re-enactment of the 1960s with her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: During another visit to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house, Grandpa takes everyone to show them the new Bug Hotel he is building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends head to the trampoline park where Miss Rabbit shows them how to bounce. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig and Mummy Sheep decide they want to have a go at trampolining.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, Peppa and George go to the Skate Park with their bicycles, scooters and skateboards. Peppa has fun playing around on Daddy's skateboard.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa looks after Madame Gazelle's guinea pigs Ginger and Brian while she goes on holiday, but prove to be more trouble for Mummy and Daddy Pig than they think.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children learn about the weather. There is a new friend for Peppa, and Grandpa Pig is making a rock garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa takes Goldie the Goldfish for a visit to the vets and is surprised when she finds that there's a new road to be built over the building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The family has all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig shares with Peppa and George his love of building toy planes and there is one extra special plane that Granny Pig has yet to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig receives a letter saying he must go away on business to test some very important concrete.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Sheep gets the news that she has got a new job far away, leaving Suzy and Peppa to wonder how they're going to carry on being best friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig get stuck behind Mrs Badger's tractor on the way to her farm, where Peppa and George learn about how useful tractors can be, even if they aren't very fast.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While Mummy Pig is hard at work, Peppa, George and Daddy make the best out of not being able to use the computer by tidying the kitchen.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Valiente
channel.desc: Tracker and Carlos come across a series of nocturnal animals fleeing the Shadow Jungle. Tracker, with help from Ryder and the pups, must brave his fear of the dark and stop a new villain, Lucita Mala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic to rescue lost cubs in 'Pups Save the Polar Bears', then in 'A Pup in Sheep's Clothing', all the little lambs keep running away from Farmer Al's pasture.

channel.desc: The pups help River take photos in a flash in 'The Crew Builds a Giant Skate Track', then in 'The Crew Bulids a Giant Ice Cream Maker', Speed Meister ruins ice cream day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Darington can't wait to ride the tallest, fastest carnival ride in all of Axle City! But when Darington's tickets blow away, he and Blaze must try to retrieve them.

channel.desc: Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control.

channel.desc: The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum takes the Fairy children for a nature class in the woods, and bumps into the Wise Old Elf who is teaching a nature class to the Elf children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's the day of Mrs Cow and Mr Bull's wedding! Not everything goes to plan, but that doesn't stop it being the best wedding ever, and there is a lot of happy crying.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest cares for a white wolf cub in 'Pups Save a White Wolf', then in 'Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer', wrong-way explorer Travelling Travis, takes Chickaletta to the North Pole.

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Box Fort', then in 'Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill!', Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island.

channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Speed Meister sabotages the Sierra Sparkle show in 'The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus', then in 'The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower', the pups make the beach safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: When a Baby Robot turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is playing with Candy Cat when Emily Elephant's Granny moves out of the apartment. When the new neighbours arrive, Peppa recognises her holiday friend Rohan Rhino.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and all her friends are having a sleepover - different friends in each of the apartments in the high street. So they play hide and seek across all the rooms.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too.

channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is giving the playgroup a singing lesson, helped by Mummy Rhino on the piano. When the parents arrive, the children perform their song.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing.

channel.desc: Diesel discovers just because trash isn't seen, it doesn't mean it's not there.

channel.desc: When Tommy enters his first Rocket Race, Tim does all he can to support his brother.

channel.desc: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.desc: Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him.
